Sentencas: The high potential of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) arises due to the high degree of efficiency and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: However, the elementary kinetic steps of the anodic processes taking place at the boundary of electrolyte-anode-gas are still largely unknown.

Sentencas: Patterned Ni anodes on Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 are regarded as a promising method to determine these kinetics.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: In analogy to our previous study with patterned Ni anodes for the H-2-H2O system, this study is systematically devoted to the elementary kinetics of the CO electrochemical oxidation in CO-CO2 gas mixtures.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: Data analysis is backed by extensive knowledge on patterned anode stability and dynamics gained during previous studies.

Sentencas: The electrochemical characterization is performed for a large parameter variation range (pCO(2), pCO and T) by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: Contrary to the characterization in H-2-H2O atmosphere no slow relaxation processes were observed and the degradation rate is smaller.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: Changes in parameter dependency over the investigated parameter range indicate different reaction mechanisms as a function of gas composition.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: Only slightly higher polarization losses are observed for CO oxidation compared to H-2.
Titulo: Studying the CO-CO2 characteristics of SOFC anodes by means of patterned Ni anodes

Sentencas: The comparison of the results from patterned anodes to high-performance Ni/8YSZ cermet anodes employed in anode supported cells yields good agreement.
